languages.text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, for each enemy killed Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. This can stack up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

Until the end of combat, each Bladedancer's attack reduces their target's Perception and Weapon Skill by −<u>(10 + AGI bonus)</u> until the start of the Bladedancer's next turn.
This effect does not stack.

Until the end of combat, each Bladedancer's attack reduces their target's Perception and Weapon Skill by −<u>(10 + AGI bonus)</u> until the start of the Bladedancer's next turn.
This effect does not stack.

Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

languages.text: Al usar {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g} tras matar a un enemigo, el hoja danzante gana +3 % de esquiva hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} veces.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: Al usar {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Vals de la muerte{/g} tras matar a un enemigo, el hoja danzante gana +3 % de esquiva hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} veces.

Hasta el final del combate, todos los ataques del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} del objetivo en −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del hoja danzante.
Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 敵を殺した後に{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}を使うと、ブレードダンサーは戦闘終了時まで+3%の回避を得る。最大 {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}回まで累積可能。
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: 敵を殺した後に{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死のワルツ{/g}を使うと、ブレードダンサーは戦闘終了時まで+3%の回避を得る。最大 {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}回まで累積可能。

戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の攻撃はそれぞれ、ブレードダンサーの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}を−<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>減少させる。
この効果はスタックしない。

languages.text: 当刀锋舞者击杀敌人之后使用{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}时，刀锋舞者的闪避提高3%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果最多叠加{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}次。
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: 当刀锋舞者击杀敌人之后使用{g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}死亡华尔兹{/g}时，刀锋舞者的闪避提高3%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果最多叠加{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}次。

直到战斗结束前，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的每次攻击都会使目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}降低<u>（10+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>，持续至刀锋舞者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'il utilise {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g} après avoir tué un ennemi, le danselame gagne +3 % à l'esquive jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable jusqu'à {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} fois.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'il utilise {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g} après avoir tué un ennemi, le danselame gagne +3 % à l'esquive jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable jusqu'à {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} fois.

Chaque fois qu'il utilise {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Valse mortelle{/g} après avoir tué un ennemi, le danselame gagne +3 % à l'esquive jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable jusqu'à {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} fois.

languages.text: Setzt der Klingentänzer {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g} ein, nachdem er einen Gegner getötet hat, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 % Ausweichen. Bis zu {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Klingentänzer {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Todeswalzer{/g} ein, nachdem er einen Gegner getötet hat, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +3 % Ausweichen. Bis zu {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}-mal stapelbar.

languages.text: После применения {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Вальса смерти{/g}, убивая врага, танцор смерти получает +3% к уклонению до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} раз.
languages.original_text:
Until the end of combat, each of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s attacks reduces their target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by −<u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> until the start of the Bladedancer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
This effect does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
До конца боя каждая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} цели на <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u> до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} танцора смерти.
Эффект не суммируется.

До конца боя каждая атака {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} цели на <u>(10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u> до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} танцора смерти.
Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Kılıç Dansçısı, bir düşmanı öldürdükten sonra {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Ölüm Valsi{/g} kullandığında +%3 kaçınma değeri kazanır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} kez üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Upon using {g|f:916fcf40f9cc410f9b0a810516089207}Death Waltz{/g} after killing an enemy, the Bladedancer gains +3% dodge until the end of combat. Stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} times.
